This directory contains a complete GitHub Discussions infrastructure designed for the Philly's RTS Toolkit community.

## ğŸš€ Quick Setup (for Admins)

1. Read [SETUP_DISCUSSIONS.md](SETUP_DISCUSSIONS.md)
2. Enable Discussions in repository settings
3. Create the 11 categories from [DISCUSSION_CATEGORIES.md](DISCUSSION_CATEGORIES.md)
4. Post welcome message from [WELCOME_DISCUSSION.md](WELCOME_DISCUSSION.md)

## ğŸ“ Available Templates

Templates help users create well-structured discussions:

1. **[unit-design.md](DISCUSSION_TEMPLATE/unit-design.md)** - Share unit designs
2. **[weapon-design.md](DISCUSSION_TEMPLATE/weapon-design.md)** - Discuss weapons
3. **[feature-request.md](DISCUSSION_TEMPLATE/feature-request.md)** - Suggest features
4. **[technical-support.md](DISCUSSION_TEMPLATE/technical-support.md)** - Get help
5. **[data-library.md](DISCUSSION_TEMPLATE/data-library.md)** - Share libraries

See [DISCUSSION_TEMPLATE/README.md](DISCUSSION_TEMPLATE/README.md) for template usage guide.

## ğŸ¯ Discussion Features

### Community Benefits
- Organized conversations by topic
- Easy sharing of unit/weapon designs
- Community support and troubleshooting
- Data library sharing
- Feature brainstorming
- Developer collaboration

### Project Benefits
- Reduce noise in GitHub Issues
- Better community engagement
- Knowledge base of Q&A
- User feedback collection
- Showcase community creativity
- Attract new contributors
